name: T-180 Type F
description:
This car is a collaboration between Mad Agus and ohyeah2389. Mad Agus made the 3D model of the car, while ohyeah2389 made the physics and sound of the car.

Designed and manufactured by Gödelian Autonomics, this WRL-homologated T-180 racing vehicle has clearly been optimized for its price-to-performance ratio, allowing new teams a low barrier-to-entry into the top level of WRL competition.

Gödelian is known for their innovative, logical, and well-researched engineering concepts, and this design is nothing but their finest work. Among its unconventional but clever features are its fiberplate-core aerodynamic wheel covers, a set of computationally-optimized aerodynamic elements, forged-titanium friction-damped control arms, and an interlocking heave/sway compensator system for the four-stage higher-multipole-accelerated hadron injection drive, which reliably provides crosscoupled boost-effect from the jet thrusters to the bespoke long-throw V12. The system is suprisingly reliable, and while it doesn't provide championship-sweeping levels of performance, it is fuel-efficient, easy to repair, and cheap to replace (if your competition is a bit too bone-headed).
author: Mad Agus and ohyeah2389
